rukus.text: 74|1|ao anak dandabphuoy( mou ham meat)
74|2|chaur anak kraok laeng  haey chaur anak dasatuen promean(mnoussa  lok ampi tearounakamm robsa a l laoh) .
74|3|haey chaur anak leukatamkeung mcheasa robsa anak choh .
74|4|haey chaur anak saamat saamliekbampeak robsa anak .
74|5|haey chaur anak chiesa aoy chhngay pi ampeu shi ri k .
74|6|haey chaur anak komaoy avei dl ke  daoy anak chngban kar tabasnang  chraen mokvinh aoy saoh .
74|7|haey daembi bampenh batobanhchea nei mcheasa robsa anak chaur anak  atthmot .
74|8|proh nowpel delke phlomtre .
74|9|ku thngai noh haey  chea thngai del lombak bamphot .
74|10|champoh puok brachheang  ku kmean kar ngeayosruol laey .
74|11|chaur anak( mou ham meat) touk aoy yeung cheamuoynung anak del yeung  ban bangkeut ke temnakeng choh .
74|12|haey yeung ban thveu aoy ke meanotropy sa mb tde chraen sdokasdamph .
74|13|ning mean kaunchaw del now cheamuoy ke .
74|14|haey yeung ban thveu aoy ke rsanow yeang sokh sruol .
74|15|banteabmk  ke mean pheap lopholn chngaoy yeung banthem aoy  ke tiet .
74|16|min dauchnaoh te.  pitabrakd nasa  ke kuchea anak del brachheang  rungrousa champoh ayeat robsa yeung .
74|17|yeung nung thveu aoy ke meantoukkh lombak yeangothngonthngor .
74|18|proh pitabrakd nasa  ke ban sa nhchu ng kit( champoh peaky  saamdei robsa mou ham meat)  ning ban rieb koumrong thveu akrak .
74|19|dau che  neah  ke trauv ban dakbandasa .  tae ke rieb koumrong thveu  akrak ban yeang dauch me  d ch
74|20|banteabmk  ke trauv ban dakbandasa .  tae ke rieb koumrong  thveu akrak ban yeang dauch me  d ch
74|21|banteabmk  ke ban pichearna .
74|22|banteabmk tiet  ke ban thveumoukh kranhouv  ning khoengmuomaw .
74|23|kraoyomk  ke ban berchenh( pi karpit) ning ban kraeut  kr tm themtiet .
74|24|ruoch ke kaban niyeay tha  nih kmeanoavei krawpi m nd akm del  ke ttuol ban pi anak chomnean moun noh laey .
74|25|nih kmeanoavei krawpi peakyasaamdei robsa mnoussa lok laey .
74|26|haey yeung nung banhchoul ke tow knong nork sa k r .
74|27|tae avei del thveu aoy anakdoeng tha  nork sa k r chea avei noh
74|28|vea min bansaoltouk sach laey  haeyka min chaolochhaoeng der .
74|29|( nork sa k r noh) vea dot sbek mnoussa lok .
74|30|nowknong nork sa k rnoh  mean mea la ai kat dbbram buon roub ( cham thveutearounakamm) .

74|31|haey yeung minban bangkeut anak karpar nork krawpi mea la- ai kat laey .  haey yeung minban bangkeut chamnuon robsa puokke laey  leuklengte chea karsaakalbong champoh puok del kmean chomnue bonnaoh  daembi aoy banda anak del ban ttuol kompir( puok yeahou ti  ning na sa r ni)  chuecheak yeang chbasa  ning daembi aoy banda anak del mean chomnue meankar  chuecheak themtiet  ning daembi komaoy anak del ban ttuol kompir ning  banda anak del mean chomnue meankar sangsay .  ning daembi aoy banda anak  del mean chomngu nowknong chetd robsa puokke  ning puok del brachheang niyeay  tha  tae a l laoh mean bamnng avei champoh uteahar teangnih .  dau che  neah der  a l laoh thveu aoy v nge  v ng champoh anaknea del trong mean chetnea  haeyka changaoulobangheanh champoh anaknea del trong mean chetnea der .  haey kmean norna mneak doengpi chamnuon kangtp nei mcheasa robsa anakakraw pi  trong laey  haey vea( nork sa k r) ka kmeanoavei krawpi chea kar romluk dl  mnoussa lok der .
